title: 'Not the original product'
body: I received this pack in April and used it twice since then. I don't think I received the original product as it does not absorb well. I had to change frequently and I am someone who never gets too much heavy flow. It was very uncomfortable. I never got Whisper online and this is the first time and I can clearly feel the major quality difference in those I bought from medical stores and this one. It's probably fake. Never ordering again.
